thread.title: Corbyn: Scots Labour without Trident policy
thread.title_full: Corbyn: Scots Labour without Trident policy - The Scotsman

author: scotsman.com
title: Corbyn: Scots Labour without Trident policy
text:
6
Have your say JEREMY Corbyn admitted Labour could go into next year’s Holyrood elections without a coherent view on Trident when he visited Scotland yesterday.
The UK Labour leader added to the confusion surrounding Labour’s stance on the nuclear weapons system when he met with MSPs in Edinburgh.
His first visit north of the border after his election as party leader was dominated by Trident, following his declaration that he would never use Britain’s nuclear deterrent.
